variations.template: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to <number:word> other target creatures.
rts: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to six other target creatures.
Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.
Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to three other target creatures.

variations.template: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to <number:word> target creatures.
rts: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to X target creatures.
Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.
